data.approach: Add hide button to project headers in /projects page, with confirmation dialog. Uses existing POST /api/projects hide/show API.

summary: Added X (hide) button to each project header in /projects page
Added confirmation modal explaining the action only hides from dashboard
data.approach: Leveraged existing hide/show API infrastructure, just needed UI components

summary: Added hide button (X icon) to project headers on /projects page
Added confirmation modal explaining action only hides from dashboard
Uses existing POST /api/projects API - no backend changes needed
Hidden projects can be restored by editing ~/.config/jat/dashboard-projects.json
